Text:
If anyone is having trouble playing these, I found this useful...
   Using Foobar2000 right-click the files, and select Utils --> Rebuild MP3 Stream.
  Thanks for the upload!

...of course you'll want to do this on COPIES of the files in the torrent NOT the files in the torrent (or you won't be able to seed -- which I'm sure you all want to do).
  Sorry for the double-post.
Can Someone Please Help Seed this for me Anyone please......Thank you
